column1: He succeeded his father, [[Araphor]], upon his death in 1589, at the age of 116.

The last prince was buried in the [[Barrow-downs]], which was also about the time that evil-spirits started coming from [[Angmar]] to dwell in the Barrow-downs.<ref>{{App

column1: After having ruled for eighty-one years, he was succeeded by his son, [[Arvegil]], upon his death in 1670.<ref name="North"/>

Argeleb's name is [[Sindarin]] for "Silver King" from ''[[ar]]'' meaning "royal", and ''[[celeb]]'' (becoming lenited to ''geleb'') meaning "silver". It is likely that Argeleb II was named after his great-grandfarther, [[Argeleb I]]
